content: My search terms included a combination of keywords related to theory of mind and psychiatry, such as "theory of mind," "mentalizing," "social cognition," "psychiatry," "psychopathology," "schizophrenia," "autism," and "neurodevelopmental disorders." I used these terms in various combinations and searched in multiple databases and online resources, including PubMed, PsycINFO, Web of Science, and Google Scholar. Additionally, I reviewed the reference lists of relevant articles and textbooks to identify additional sources.
